help.title: help
help.description:
This is quiz chat bot escho! Answer question by clicking any alphabet emoji below the question.

All commands start with `/`. To use the commands in a group channel, add the prefix `@escho#1145` to the command. For example, you can show your status to others in **qa-quiz** by sending `@escho#1145 /status` in the qa-quiz channel.

fields.name: /start
fields.value: Register by your discord id and start QA quiz in a private channel. The bot will then send you your status. You should check whether the status is yours, and then you can register a new one by specifying the new id with `/start your-new-id` (the following command).

fields.name: /start alice
fields.value: Register as alice and start to answer questions.

fields.name: /next
fields.value: Ask for the next question. The previous question will still show up in the future.
